pageContext.claim: “Let me tell you about ISIS. They're not doing so well. You know, we took over the caliphate. You'll see it tonight. … When I took over, it was a mess. They were all over the place. … The caliphate is gone, as of tonight. Pretty good. That’s pretty good, right? We took over a mess.”
pageContext.analysis: Although they have lost the territory they once controlled, ISIS remains a threat, according to U.S. military and intelligence officials, and could mount a resurgence.
